channel.title: 1.0.9 Scripted tutorial layout a bit off
channel.description: #### What happened? The layout on the top right in the scripted tutorial is a bit off. #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? The layout should cover all of the text. #### Steps to reproduce: Get in a scripted tutorial game, check the layout on the top right. #### Comments: ![layout|690x373](upload://wg8bsF6KVLtnToPrPrDISHrF9xh.jpg)

item.title: 1.0.9 Scripted tutorial layout a bit off
item.dc:creator: Sicky
item.description:
What happened?

The layout on the top right in the scripted tutorial is a bit off.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

The layout should cover all of the text.

Steps to reproduce:

Get in a scripted tutorial game, check the layout on the top right.

Comments:

Read full topic
